founder.bio: I am a licensed Architect (OAQ) with a B. Arch from Balamand University (Lebanon) and a M.sc. degree in project management from the University of Montreal. I have been practicing for 25+ years in Montreal and the MENA area: Dubai, Qatar, KSA (vision 2030). The work focused mainly on the following activities: Sports, Health, Education and Residential.
founder.goal: My goal, as a project manager, is to find challenging and rewarding work that would allow me to expand on my current experience as well as challenge my capabilities.
